title: Massive splenomegaly due to splenic marginal zone B-cell lymphoma.
summary: Physical examination revealed massive enlargement of the spleen-the spleen had crossed the midline and its lower margin extended into the lower abdomen....
abstract: A 73-year-old man presented with an abdominal mass that gradually swells over 3 months. He denied any subjective symptoms. Physical examination revealed massive enlargement of the spleen-the spleen had crossed the midline and its lower margin extended into the lower abdomen.
